title: RussianEnglishTranslation
author: RussianEnglishTranslation
content: Candle Chain $CNDL is a highly scalable L1 blockchain engineered to host metaverses. $CNDL exists on it's own native chain and is bridged to Ethereum as the contract- 0x3d97edb1c1d87c0cbf098a0d2230d7380d4b1432Candle Chain offers the following features:*2 second transaction finality*8k TPS*0 transaction fees*POS with high APY rewards*EVM compatible*Low carbon footprint*Ethereum bridge infrastructure*Designed to host metaverses and Ethereum compatible DApps such as NFT marketplaces, AMMs, DeFi, and GameFi*Multi-chain Mobile wallet with built in DApp and block explorersCandle Labs, the organization behind Candle Chain, is building their own metaverse. It's designed to host an open world, VR space that operates on top of Candle Chain without the friction and complexity of gas fees that other chains have. This platform will be a safe space for people of all ages to play and explore their spirituality in a variety of religious zones. The $CNDL coin will have a variety of uses within this metaverse including: burning $CNDL when worshiping, funding church DAOs, purchasing land/clothing/furniture and more.Website: https://www.candlelabs.org https://cndlchain.comTelegram : https://t.me/candlelabs   Discord: https://discord.gg/4nABzqsX8C   Twitter: https://twitter.com/candle_labs   Instagram: https://instagram.com/candle_labs   Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/cndl/   Github: https://github.com/CandlePlatforms   Docs: https://docs.candlelabs.org/   Linkedin: https://linkedin.com/company/candle-labs   Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CandleLabsInc/   Medium: https://cndl.medium.com      Coinmarketcap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/candle/   Coingecko: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/candle   Nomics: https://nomics.com/assets/cndl2-candle   $CNDL is traded on: Bankcex, Decoin, Tokpie, Digifinex, Sushiswap, Vindax, Uniswap, Pancakeswap, KnoxExchangeThere is currently a live bounty program in which participants can earn over 500k $CNDL coins. Candle Labs is also hiring developers and offering grants and bounties to existing projects to deploy on the chain. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfqgEiJAjAl1SpkbvBEtgXhyOfIyIXRGH31moTHpOYA8VWupQ/viewform

comments.author: unnamed0simple
comments.body: bankcex CNDL-USDT, vindax CNDL_USDT, No ones got usdt for market.There must be a rational explanation for this.

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: $CNDL is currently traded on nine exchanges with more coming. If you can't find the pair your like on one exchange, you may wish to try another or use a different stablecoin.
